metadata.name: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity Invoking Sys File
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sys,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sys '))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452
